snippet: In three seasons, the Phillies have transformed from the National League’s highest-scoring team to its best pitching team.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; Philadelphia Phillies general manager Ruben Amaro Jr has built the team around pitching, and in just three seasons Phillies have transformed from National League's highest-scoring team to its best pitching team.
lead_paragraph: In three seasons, the Phillies have transformed from the National League’s highest-scoring team to its best pitching team.

headline.seo: As Phillies Score Fewer Runs, They Get Better at Preventing Them
headline.main: For the Phillies, an Exchanging of the Guard
headline.print_headline: Phillies Scuffle for Runs After an Exchanging of the Guard
